ygData.subject: Re: Finally 15 but where now?
ygData.msgSnippet: the best place you can go for soloing at this level is Lavastorm. It will bring you at level 18 in no time. After 18, it s still good but not as good. To get
ygData.messageBody:
the best place you can go for soloing at this level is Lavastorm. It will
bring you at level 18 in no time. After 18, it's still good but not as good.
To get there, Take the boat to Freeport, go in East Commons, enter Nektulos
forest ( follow the right wall to get there )and turn into a dark elf then
follow the path straight all the way to lavastorm. as you enter lavastorm,
follow the right edge and you'll soon find the entrance of the Najena
dungeon. This is a great place to hunt. Xp is amazing on the lavas crawlers.
Loot is also pretty good ( although not extraordinary ). Hunt in Lavastorm
and zone in najena if there is any trouble.
Also, this place is full of darkies, ogres and trolls so if you like duels,
you'll have a good time.
Note: A magic weapon can help...try to buy or get a runed totem staff first.
Skara de Toxxulia.

-----Original Message-----
From: Andrea Maionchi [mailto:okandrea@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 11:29 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Finally 15 but where now?


Hail Friends,

I finally reached lvl 15! but I am at a loss now. I have traveled far, from
Erudin to Felwithe and currently hunt at the Sister camp in Lesser Faydark.

For those that do not know, this is (well was until last patch) a great
place for loot and exp. I started hunting there at 12th and made my way to
15th quickly and after buying all my spells I still have 150pp in the bank.

Well now this place is too easy for me and need a better place to reach 16th
preferably with good loot. I would like to solo to 16th but in safety. I
hear you say, don't we all!

Any ideas where I could find such a place/camp?

Eregil - Erudite Enchanter.
